lead_paragraph: The bankrupt Revel Casino Hotel in Atlantic City is set to close by Sept. 10 after its owner failed to find a buyer for the 1,400-room resort, marking the latest casualty for the struggling New Jersey gambling center.

headline.main: Atlantic City's Struggling Revel Casino to Close by Next Month
headline.print_headline: Atlantic City's Struggling Revel Casino to Close by Next Month
